alert.note: Alert for Absaroka, Beartooth Mountains; Beartooth Foothills; Livingston Area; Northern Sweet Grass (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 25 at 4:21PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Sweet Grass and northeastern Park Counties through 500 PM MDT... At 419 PM MDT, trained weather spotters reported a strong thunderstorm 15 miles east of Livingston, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail and heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Accumulating hail with heavy rainfall will make travel hazardous. Locations impacted include... Big Timber, Springdale and Mc Leod. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Absaroka, Beartooth Mountains; Beartooth Foothills; Livingston Area; Northern Sweet Grass
